short_summary: The Department of National Defence intends to contract the items listed below.
description: See attached documents for the full description, quantity and delivery information.
full_summary:
# Reference Information
* Reference Number: cb-368-72340170
* Solicitation Number: W8486-238940/A
* Amendment Number: 5

## Notice Information
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence

## Goods and Services Required
The Department of National Defence invites bids for a Request for Standing Offer for the supply of various military cans and accessories. The required items include:

* 19 different types of military cans and accessories, including screws, caps, tags, markers, and pans
* Detailed specifications for each item are provided in Annex A of the tender document

## Delivery Requirements
Deliveries must be completed in accordance with the call-up against the Standing Offer. The delivery locations are:

* Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St. E., Montreal, QC H1N 1V9
* Department of National Defence, 7 CF Supply Depot, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236, Edmonton, AB T5J 4J5

## Submission Requirements
Bidders must submit their proposals in the required format and language. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Important Information
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Tender Details
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-24T14:00:00
* Tender Status: Expired
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Deborah Moldowan
	+ Email: Deborah.Moldowan@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (819) 939-0832

## Attachments
[download links to attachments]
